urls.title: Fees and charges | Jetstar
urls.description: Your authoritative guide to Jetstar's fees and charges for customer transactions, including payments, refunds, changes and bookings.

data.text: @selenajoy2 Hi Selena, if you want to change the name on your Starter Fare ticket, you will need to pay a name change fee and any applicable fare difference. You can find out more here https://t.co/j16vGNTWPZ. Alternatively, you can DM us to discuss this further. Thanks - Kauri

@twinfold I appreciate your frustration @twinfold. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM with more info. We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan
@twinfold Hi. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. To check this further for you, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@mralexdawson Hi Alex, sorry to hear that. We'd like to look into this for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks - Leslie
@KelMayo Hi Kellie. I have responded to your DM. Thanks - Chichi

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @vSaint_TD Hi @vSaint_TD, sorry to hear about your lost baggage. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this! For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Kauri

@Celebchaser Hi Ange, we’re so glad that one of our team members was able to assist you in organizing a credit. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!) Hoping you and your family have a speedy recovery.  Thanks. – Kauri
@1RosieThomas Hi Rosie, I’m sorry to hear this. Can you please DM me your booking reference number (PNR) so I can look into this for you? Thanks - Leslie

@LiggyEiE Hi Liggy, I understand how upsetting it can be when you've made plans in advance and the flight got cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

@Unilennium Hi Pratik, thanks for reaching out. Our team are always open to new ideas and we evaluate our schedules all the time to see how we can improve. We'll be sure that once a new flight is added, it will be available for booking immediately. Thanks - Dan

@theresatrends Sorry to hear you're unable to reach us Theresa. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference and full name? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@jwo30 Hi Jo, thanks for reaching out. I can see your Case Manager responded via email on the 30th March. To request a review, you can respond directly to your case or feel free to DM us if you require assistance. Thanks – Dan
@taylorannmorgan Hi Taylor, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Would you mind sending us a PM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Leslie

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @AlexCarlyle89 Hi Alex, sorry to hear that your luggage was delayed. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this. For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Dan
@endlesamusement Thanks for letting us know so we can keep working on improving our process. If you need further assistance, feel free to DM us here. Thanks - Norine 2/2

@endlesamusement Hi Endlesamusement, I'm sorry for any inconvenience. While I understand waiting in a long queue is never a good feeling, you can be certain that our team are working hard to assist you with the best that they can. 1/2

urls.title: Sales and special deals | Jetstar
urls.description: Rather be on holiday? Check out Jetstar’s latest sales, deals and exclusive offers. Find domestic and international flights at the lowest price guaranteed, backed by our Price Beat Guarantee. Conditions apply.

data.text: @SandraRitaH We’re excited to announce this morning that we’ll start flying between Sydney and Seoul from November. We have some great sale fares available now from $199 - visit https://t.co/CSA2DQrdXy to lock it in 😉 Thanks - Cabs
@RahulPrasad74 That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Rahul – and we’re sure Maria will love to hear it too. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass it on. 😊 - Leslie
@SandraRitaH Hi Sandra, you can check the availability of the flights on our website -- https://t.co/oXTR1OVAPZ Thanks - Norine

@amybuzz Hi Amy, we do our best to seat families together and our check-in staff are always on hand to make sure that young children are seated with a parent or guardian on the day of travel. If you require assistance with your booking, feel free to DM us here. Thanks - Norine

@sera_bomba Hi Sera, I’m sorry to hear your travels with us haven’t gone smoothly. We’d appreciate the chance to look into your experience further and see what we can do to help. Please DM us with your booking reference to get started. Thanks – Dan

urls.title: Carry-on baggage | What you can bring on board | Jetstar
urls.description: Everything you need to know about carry-on baggage allowances on Jetstar flights. Save on airport prices by booking in advance!

data.text: @cauld Hi Chris, thanks for reaching out. Your carry-on allowance is separate to your checked baggage allowance. You can check check our website using this link https://t.co/yLRqdzk9zk. If you need to discuss a specific booking send us a DM with more info. Thanks - Dan

@LynetteP Hi Lynette, sorry to hear that you've been on queue for over 30 minutes. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We'd be happy to look into this further. Thanks - Jay
@NiqDog Hi NickDog, Could you please send us a DM here? We'd love the chance to check this for you further. Thanks - Norine
@JackieHansard 2/2 The sold out (sometimes cheaper) fare becomes available again and prices lower. Hope that helps. Thanks - Dan

@JackieHansard 1/2 Hi Jackie, I appreciate you’re upset. Generally over time, fares increase in cost as each class of fare sells out. Sometimes sold out classes become available when a customer defaults on their payment or cancels their booking.
@vrn8305 Hi vrn83. Please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference so we can check this further. Thanks - Chichi
@CouchySays Hi Andy, We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Could you please DM us, so we can look into things for you? Thanks - Norine
@MikeHarrisssss Hi Mike. Thanks for reaching out, would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Dan

@isabelrivascl Hi Isabel, I'm sorry to hear that you had changes on your tickets. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to DM us if you require to discuss your options further. Thanks - Jay

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

data.text: @pushkarsingh89 Hi Pushkar, sorry to hear about your iPad. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this! For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Vi

@TysonBarker8 Hi @TysonBarker8. If there aren’t any sale fares left on the dates you are searching, you could check the sale page for a different date and try again. Feel free to send us a DM so we can assist further. Thanks - Paul

@timwelsheliot Hi Tim, sorry to hear that you're having trouble adding seats to your booking on our website. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @AdamSilva3 Hi Adam, thanks for reaching out. I appreciate that you will be travelling with kids. To know more about car seats you can check out this link - https://t.co/Jzu4rmX4mX. If you require any assistance with your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi
@vrn8305 The info is available here: https://t.co/vIekY3kMrD. Just fill up the needed details. Thanks - Chichi

urls.title: Prepare to fly international | Jetstar
urls.description: Prepare for your Jetstar flight by learning more about the changes to international travel including airline and government requirements.

data.text: @vrn8305 Hi vrn83. There are various government travel requirements in place across our flights right now that may include mandatory health declarations and vaccinations. Please visit this link: https://t.co/fLansX7I9d for more info on the requirements of your destination. Thanks - Chichi
@GeorgMendrina Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear about the error on your booking. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@afifowife Hi Deb, thanks for reaching out. There are many reasons why there is a schedule change like some of them are due to operational adjustments that we have to make caused by various situations. You can send us a DM for further assistance on your booking. Thanks - Vi

@afifowife Hi Deb, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll check your grandfather's booking further. Thanks - Chichi

@LorraineHDx Hi Lorraine, sorry to hear that online check-in is not available. If you require assistance with your booking send us a DM with more info. We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan

@sophieloupalmer Hi Sophie. Sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM with more info. Thanks - Dan
@shai2392 Hi @shai2392, sorry to hear there were changes on your flights. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM here? Thanks - Norine

@RadelaideSA Hi Ryan. Sorry to her that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan

@BrandDNA Hi Stanley. I understand that this is frustrating for you. We are unable to discuss your booking publicly due to privacy policy. If you could send us a DM with your full name and booking reference we can check this for you. Thanks - Chichi

@BrandDNA Hi Stanley, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please DM us with your booking details and we'd be happy to assist. Thanks – Jay
@tehe97_ Hi Samara. I'm sorry to hear about the injury. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan

data.text: @urbluff33 This is to ensure eligibility to travel before booking and before travel. If you require assistance on a specific booking, please send us a DM to further assist. Thanks - Bree (2/2)

@urbluff33 Hi Mark, I appreciate your feedback and will pass this to the team. It may help to know however that we take care to advise passengers to check the latest Government travel requirements for both origin and destination. (1/2)

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar
urls.description: Chat with one of our friendly Jetstar customer service

data.text: @urbluff33 Hi Mark, it may help to know that government restrictions may change from time to time. Feel free to view our Travel Alerts page (https://t.co/x2fv8LVUHF) for the latest updates, including the requirements of the state/country you're coming from and entering in. Thanks - Bree

@trisdunning Hi Tristan. I'm sorry to hear that you're unable to reply to the email sent to you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jay

@jessw1233 Hi Jess, I appreciate you will need to update the date of birth for one of the passengers. Can you send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we can assist you with this? Thanks - Bree
@marialovesyou91 Hi Maria, I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble booking your flight on our website. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can help you sort out your booking? Thanks. - Kauri

@aqualung Hi Ric. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. If it still doesn't work, kindly send us a DM. Thanks – Chichi
@Paaariii Hi Paras, That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into what happened here? Thanks - Norine

@crowroadaw Hi Adam, thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear that you're having trouble accepting the changes with your flight on our website. To assist you with your booking, can you send us a DM? Thanks. - Kauri
@realmikedalton Hi Mike, thanks for reaching out. We’d like to assist you with this. Would you mind sending us a DM? Thanks – Jaya

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @jwo30 Hi Jo, thanks for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about your lost item. Our baggage team is the best place to assist with this! For more info and to speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Kauri
@LomasNZ Hi LomasNZ. Sorry for any inconvenience it caused you, we’ll definitely pass on the feedback. Thanks - Dan
@makennacamille Hi Makenna, I’m really sorry to hear this. Can you please send us a DM with your booking reference and some more info? We’d like to assist. Thanks - Kauri

@fnq_the Hi there, I really appreciate your feedback. We’d like to look into this for you, as we’re usually proud of the experience we provide our customers. If you require any assistance with your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi

@olgamatoula Hi Olga. Sorry to hear about this. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. If you need further assistance with your booking, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@fnq_the Hi there. We’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver and I'm sorry to hear this was not your experience at the airport. If you need further assistance with your booking, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

urls.title: Prepare to fly international | Jetstar
urls.description: Prepare for your Jetstar flight by learning more about the changes to international travel including airline and government requirements.

data.text: @Charlie_Ineson Hey Charlie. There are various government travel requirements in place across our flights now that may include mandatory health declarations and vaccinations etc. Please visit this link: https://t.co/2bKNyWGDoA for info on the requirements of your destination. Thanks - Chichi
@toogs1 Hi Tegan. Sorry to hear about this. Kindly send us a DM so we can check this further. Thanks - Chichi

@tasker_simone Hi Simone. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Can you please send us a DM with your booking reference and some more info? We’d like to assist. Thanks - Dan

@benjdunn Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. If you require any assistance to sort your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks - Vi
@BenKersten91 We’d like to look into this for you, Ben – as we’re usually really proud of the experience we provide our customers. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? Thanks - Leslie
@that_fiona Hi Fiona, it usually takes 14 business days for a credit voucher to come through to your email. You may also send us a DM if you require any further assistance. Thanks - Bree
@ChrisMusty Hi Christopher, I understand this must be upsetting for you. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this for you. Thanks - Norine

@lewi_vuittonn Hi @lewi_vuittonn, sorry to hear you're having trouble paying online. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. If the same problem occurs, please contact our telephone reservations team at 131 538 to assist you with the change. Thanks- Jen

@agust_yoonji Hi there. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. If you require any assistance with your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi

@mrengeman We’d like to look into this for you, Michael – as we’re usually really proud of the experience we provide our customers. Could you please DM us with your booking reference number to speak with someone from the team? Thanks- Jen

@QuashHah Hi James, while delays are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team is working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Thanks for letting us know so we can keep working on improving our service. -Kauri

@QuashHah Hi James, I'm sorry to hear about the delay. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. You may send us a DM if you require further assistance on a specific booking. Thanks - Jay

data.text: @raggarwal822 Hi Rahul, sorry to hear that. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this. For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Leslie

urls.title: Book Cheap Flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Jetstar offers low fares all day every day from Australia's best cheap flights airline.

data.text: @emworner Hi Elaine. Thanks for getting back to us, you can use this link for multi-city bookings: https://t.co/ihytbziv3U. Jetstar voucher can only be used to book any flights within the Jetstar network only, hope that helps. Thanks - Dan
@redd_f0x Hi there. Sorry to hear about what happened. To check this further for you, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@maggersz Hi Erica, I’m sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay
@AlphaMailleAUS I understand. Can you send us a DM with your booking reference and full name so we can check this further? Thanks - Chichi

@claire_mcdoug99 Hi Claire, I’m sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference number? We’d be happy to assist you with your seats now. Thanks- Jen
@Sam_ShortNRare That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Samantha. Thanks for your feedback - we appreciate you for letting us know. Thanks - Leslie
@SetioSoemeri Hi Setio, I’m really sorry to hear this. Can you please send us a DM with your booking reference and some more info? We’d like to assist. Thanks - Dan
@Jessky922 Hi Jessky. I'm sorry to hear about what happened with your baggage. Kindly send us a DM with your full name and booking reference so we can check this further. Thanks - Chichi
@AlphaMailleAUS Hi @AlphaMailleAU, I understand that you want the seat that you paid for. Can you please send us a DM with your booking reference and some more info? We’d like to assist. Thanks - Dan
@nadine_id That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, Nadine. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. Thanks - Jen

@nadine_id Hi Nadine, we know how inconvenient delayed flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We may be able to provide more details about your delayed flight. Thanks - Norine

@ivangreen99 Hi Ivan, I'm sorry to hear that. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a DM with the booking details so we can look into this and assist further? Thanks - Jay

urls.title: Seats: Can I book an extra legroom seat? | Jetstar
urls.description: Need some extra room? Jetstar's guide to how to book a seat with extra legroom for all fare types and the relevant eligibility criteria.

data.text: @AlphaMailleAUS Hi @AlphaMailleAUS, I'm sorry to hear that. If you’d like to sit in an Exit Row, then you’ll be subject to certain safety requirements. You can read more about it here - https://t.co/Wy6YmSi32p. Feel free to send us a DM if you require further assistance. Thanks. -Kauri
@trisdunning Hi Tristan, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Could you please DM us, so we can look into things for you? Thanks- Jen

@trisdunning Hi Tristan, we know this can be really frustrating when things don’t go as planned. We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? Thanks - Leslie

@BridieHoran Hi Bridie, I understand how serious and upsetting this situation must be for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

@Akcra Hey Taylor, thanks for reaching out! There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to Jasmin and Joel, they’ll be stoked to hear it. - Dan
@Jamersthoughts Hi James, this must be important to you. Can you please send us a DM here? We'd appreciate the chance to look into it further. Thanks - Norine

@BrainsAtHand Hi Brian, I'm sorry to hear this and hope you’re feeling better now. We’d appreciate the chance to assist – can you please send us a DM with further info and your booking details? Thanks  – Kauri

urls.title: Book Cheap Flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Jetstar offers low fares all day every day from Australia's best cheap flights airline.

data.text: @emworner Hi Elaine. We appreciate your feedback and this will be passed on to the relevant team. You can use this link for multi-city bookings: https://t.co/ihytbziv3U. Thanks - Chichi

@smithk6 No one likes paying for excess baggage, Katie. That’s why we’re so clear about our policies when you book. All of our customers are given 7kg of carry-on. It’s less about making a profit and more about being able to keep the costs of our fares down. Thanks - Norine

data.text: @glynisb1999 Hi Glynis, I'm sorry to hear about your undelivered meals. Can you send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we can assist you further on this? Thanks - Bree
@des_soares Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Sorry to hear about this. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@smithk6 Hi Kate, thanks for reaching out. While I understand that it may be upsetting to pay for extra baggage. However carry-on and checked baggage are weighed separately – so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. - Vi
@theunbeliever69 I appreciate you're still having trouble booking online, Pee. Would you mind sending us a DM of your booking details so we can assist you further? Thanks - Bree
